title: Sweet typo
content:
I wish I could get this chocolate here in Oslo. What a great idea:  
 [http://www.typolade.de/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20081010003736/http:/www.typolade.de/index.html "http://www.typolade.de/index.html")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081010003736im_/http:/typophile.com/files/XLBB-D2__Sjokolade_149812a_5637.jpg)

 [‹ What is this typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20081010003736/http:/typophile.com/node/50263 "Go to previous forum topic") [What font did NBC use in the Beijing Olympics logo? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081010003736/http:/typophile.com/node/50248 "Go to next forum topic")
author: magnus_rakeng

comments.content: I recently saw this on iLT, great indeed! You might want to send them a message, I believe they send anywhere in the EU.

Norway is not an EU member. But they [state they ship to Non-EU countries, too, by arrangement](http://web.archive.org/web/20081010003736/http:/www.typolade.de/bestellung-m.html). Shipping is €4,50 in Germany and €8,50 within the EU, up to 1kg.

1 kilo should be enough I guess.  
:-)

1 kilo of lead or chocolate? :-)

ChrisL
Serving suggestion: Rig the box to make a typesetting stick that can be pressed onto a nice hot crêpe.

And the furniture should be made from the same stuff they use for digestive biscuits!
